name: post-terraform-plan
description: GitHub Action to post Terraform plan to PR comments with beautiful formatting

scripts.test:refactored: npm run test:value-validator && npm run test:formatters && npm run test:change-detection && npm run test:resource-change-formatter && npm run test:plan-parser
scripts.test:formatters: node tests/formatters/value-formatter.test.js && node tests/formatters/array-formatter.test.js && node tests/formatters/diff-marker.test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:ui && npm run test:refactored
scripts.preview:all: node src/generate-preview.js --fixture realistic && node src/generate-preview.js --fixture no-changes && node src/generate-preview.js --fixture create-only
